go_data.justification: beta1 integrin is involved in the interaction with vascular cell adhesion molecule 1 (VCAM-1) for selective recruitment of eosinophils into sites of allergic inflammation.
beta1 is a subunit of the integrin complex, forming alpha4beta1 and alpha4beta7 integrins.
beta1 integrin is involved in the recruitment of eosinophils into sites of allergic inflammation, which is a type of leukocyte migration.
